description: Unlock data-driven decision making. Learn to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform leadership strategies.

mcqs.question: What is the primary goal of data-driven decision making?
What is the purpose of creating data visualizations?
options: C) To communicate complex data insights

flashcards.back: The process of creating graphical representations of data to better understand and communicate complex data insights.
Quantifiable measures used to track and evaluate the performance of an organization or business.

generated_text:
"Module 44: Data" (19 minutes, Intermediate) 
Unlock data-driven decision making. Learn to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform leadership strategies. Discover how to identify key metrics, create data visualizations, and drive business outcomes. Practical examples and case studies will help you apply data insights to real-world scenarios, enhancing your leadership skills.
